Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Cobblestone \Cob"ble*stone`\, n. A large pebble; a rounded stone not too large to be handled; a small boulder; -- used for paving streets and for other purposes. [1913 Webster]
cobblestone n : rectangular paving stone with curved top; once used to make roads [syn: {cobble}, {sett}]
